data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jakarta Raya, Indonesia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jakarta Raya, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Jakarta Raya to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 31 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Jakarta Raya, Indonesia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 802,264 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Taje people.
Spirit, please defend the 319,333 believers in Jakarta Raya against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Jakarta Raya.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 319,333 believers in the state of Jakarta Raya.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

location.name: Jakarta Raya
location.people_groups_list: Taloki, Dayak Pasir, Suwawa, Lola, Warabal, Luhu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Taloki (600), Dayak Pasir (62,000), Suwawa (5,600), Lola, Warabal (1,000), Luhu (11,000)
